name: Shared Foresight
formula: Passive: Echo Dodge applies to allies at half rate. Max party 30%.
description: Shares evasion with party at half rate.

name: Memory Link
formula: 3 turns: each dodge triggers counter ATK*0.8.

name: Time Scar
formula: Passive: Foreshadow pre-enemy 2.2x. Enemies AGI -15% 2 turns.
description: Amplifies Foreshadow Strike with AGI debuff.

name: Infinite Ambush
formula: Act THREE times. Same-target third action +50% bonus.
description: Upgraded Temporal Ambush with three actions.
